log.input:
Please modify the following program based on this instruction:
change the ball's color to red

Current program:
h = 5

scene.center = vector(0, -h, 0)

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, h, 0), radius=0.1, color=color.blue)
floor = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(10, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)

t = 0
dt = 0.01
v = vector(10, 0, 0)
a = vector(0, -9.81, 0)
b = 0.1

while t < 3:
    rate(100)
    f = -b * v
    a = vector(0, -9.81, 0) + f
    v = v + a * dt
    ball.pos = ball.pos + v * dt
    if ball.pos.y <= 0:
        ball.pos.y = 0
        v.y = -v.y
    t = t + dt
log.output:
h = 5

scene.center = vector(0, -h, 0)

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, h, 0), radius=0.1, color=color.red)
floor = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(10, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)

t = 0
dt = 0.01
v = vector(10, 0, 0)
a = vector(0, -9.81, 0)
b = 0.1

while t < 3:
    rate(100)
    f = -b * v
    a = vector(0, -9.81, 0) + f
    v = v + a * dt
    ball.pos = ball.pos + v * dt
    if ball.pos.y <= 0:
        ball.pos.y = 0
        v.y = -v.y
    t = t + dt
